remarks: Alternate expression for less-than relation.  ( ~ dfpss3 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2011.)
statement:
pleval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pleval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
pleval2.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
pltval3 $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .< Y <-> ( X .<_ Y /\ -. Y .<_ X ) ) ) $.
